mapper.select: SELECT m.ITEMDCD AS itemdcd, i.ITEM4NM AS item4nm, i.ITEM4CD AS item4cd, m.ANO AS ano, m.ACDID AS acdid, m.ANM AS anm, m.AMODELNO AS amodelno, m.AMODELNM AS amodelnm, c.CONM AS conm, m.ACORPCD as acorpcd, m.ACORP as acorp, m.APART AS apart, m.AUSER AS auser, m.MYEAR AS myear, m.MCORP AS mcorp, s.STATENM AS statenm, m.ITEM1CD AS item1cd, m.ITEM2CD AS item2cd, m.ITEM3CD AS item3cd, m.REGID AS regid, m.REGIP AS regip, TO_CHAR(m.REGDT, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS regdt, m.ATTR1 AS attr1, m.ATTR2 AS attr2, m.ATTR3 AS attr3, m.ATTR4 AS attr4, m.ATTR5 AS attr5, m.IYEAR AS iyear, m.APLACE AS aplace, m.SPEC AS spec, m.PRICE AS price FROM ats_master m, ats_item i, ats_state s, corpcode c WHERE i.item2cd = '98' AND m.itemdcd = i.item4cd AND m.astate=s.statecd AND m.acorpcd=concat(c.cocd, c.divcd) AND ITEMDCD=#{itemdcd} AND ANO=#{ano}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ats_m_history ( ITEMDCD,ANO,SEQ,ANM,ACORPCD,ACORP,APART,AUSER,MYEAR,MCORP,ASTATE,ITEM1CD,ITEM2CD, ITEM3CD,REGID,REGIP,REGDTATTR1,ATTR2,ATTR3,ATTR4,ATTR5,IYEAR,APLACE,SPEC,ACDID ) SELECT ITEMDCD,ANO,(SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ)+1,1) AS SEQ FROM ATS_M_HISTORY WHERE ITEMDCD=#{itemdcd} AND ANO=#{ano}), ANM,ACORPCD,ACORP,APART,AUSER,MYEAR,MCORP,ASTATE,ITEM1CD,ITEM2CD,ITEM3CD,REGID,REGIP,REGDT, ATTR1,ATTR2,ATTR3,ATTR4,ATTR5,IYEAR,APLACE,SPEC,ACDID FROM ATS_MASTER WHERE ITEMDCD=#{itemdcd} AND ANO=#{ano}
